value.name: Detroit Pistons scout with coronavirus had 12% chance to live. He's now recovering at home
value.description: When Detroit Pistons scout Maury Hanks woke up, he didn't remember how he got to hospital. Now recovering from COVID-19, he's at home, and thankful.

video.name: Detroit Pistons scout with coronavirus had 12% chance to live. He's now recovering at home

value.name: Ben Wallace: Pistons likely wouldn't have won any rings with Carmelo Anthony
value.description: Portland Trailblazers forward Carmelo Anthony got into the action when he told Dwyane Wade on Instagram live recently that he would've won "maybe two or three" rings if the Detroit Pistons drafted him instead of the Denver Nuggets.

value.name: Who might Pistons pursue in 2020 free agency?
value.description: This off-season figures to be tame by comparison, with fewer marquee players set to hit the market and fewer teams with ample cap space to make a splash. The Detroit Pistons are among a handful of teams that will have significant cap space – $31 million as of now, according to Spotrac.com, which tracks contract figures in various sports.

value.name: New Detroit Pistons beat writer Omari Sankofa II excited for his homecoming
value.description: New Detroit Pistons beat writer  excited for his homecoming The Detroit native is excited to return home and cover the Detroit Pistons, who he grew up watching. Check out this story on Freep.com: / In 2012,

value.name: Ben Wallace not sure Pistons would have won titles if they drafted Carmelo over Darko
value.description: Carmelo Anthony said recently if the Detroit Pistons had drafted him No. 2 instead of Darko Miličić, he would have won two or three titles. Chauncy Billups agreed with him. Ben Wallace isn’t buying it.

value.name: Detroit Pistons, corporate partners help address food insecurity with Forgotten Harvest grant
value.description: The Pistons’ relationship with Forgotten Harvest dates back to 2008. The partnership was strengthened when vice chairman Arn Tellem joined the Pistons in 2016. Tellem’s wife, Nancy, sits on the non-profit’s board of directors and the couple hosted a comedy night fundraiser at the Fox Theatre. Tellem and Pistons officials have discussed ...

value.name: Melo: I would've won 'maybe two or three rings' if Pistons drafted me
value.description: One of the great NBA draft blunders of the last 20 years occurred in 2003, when the Detroit Pistons selected Darko Milicic at No. 2 ahead of Carmelo Anthony. Despite Melo's perceived flaws, he's likely heading to the Hall of Fame.

value.name: Q&A with former Pistons great Isiah Thomas: Bad Boys culture didn't need to change
value.description: Q&A with former Pistons great Isiah Thomas: Bad Boys culture didn't need to change Isiah Thomas spoke with The Detroit News’ Rod Beard about the current state of the Pistons’ franchise and their rebuild. Check out this story on detroitnews.com: https://www.detroitnews.com/story/sports/nba/pistons/2020/04/05/q-a-former-pistons-great-isiah ...

value.name: Carmelo Anthony thinks he could have won 2-3 rings with Detroit, Ben Wallace disagrees
value.description: NBC Sports Northwest One of the NBA's greatest what-if's is what would have happened if in the 2003 NBA Draft, the soon-to-be NBA Champion Detroit Pistons, took Carmelo Anthony to add to their already stacked team.

provider.name: NBC Sports Regional: Northwest on MSN.com

value.name: Pistons scout Maury Hanks resting at home after scary battle with coronavirus
value.description: After spending nine days on a ventilator fighting for his life, longtime NBA scout Maury Hanks is now resting at home.

video.name: Pistons scout Maury Hanks resting at home after scary battle with coronavirus
